Posts.Content: Sounds like you have similar to me my first operation was early March,second early April. I have a seroma under my first scar which was slowly disappearing so they didn't drain it,unfortunately I got an infection in it a fortnight ago. My GP prescribed strong antibiotics and I have been and had it drained so I am on the mend waiting to start radiotherapy. This is not a horror story in fact the opposite I was treated quickly, just wanted to say keep an eye on your lump and don't hesitate to go to your GP if needed.Hope all goes well x
